page.title: 14...HOUSING
page.content: Most of the houses in the area are fairly modern,although there are some older ones.They are made of brick and are in good condition.There are also flats and maisonettes.All the gardens are fairly tidy and quite big.Only a few houses have garages as they were built before the people all had cars. The majority of the houses are of the smaller 3-bedroomed type,but there are many different types of house;bungalows terraced,semi-detached and flats.There is a mixture of private and council property. There are some new estates which have only recently been finished & they look very nice & have garage blocks.The maisonettes are not in very good condition,looking dirty and often being damp inside.
